description: Test suite for the DeepSeek agent using various tools, including YFinanceTools, DuckDuckGoTools, and ExaTools, with multiple test cases for tool invocation, streaming, and parameter handling.

methods.name: test_tool_use
methods.description: Tests basic tool invocation and response content for the agent.

methods.name: test_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Tests streaming response and tool call detection during streaming.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use
methods.description: Asynchronous test for tool invocation and response content.

methods.name: test_async_tool_use_stream
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test for tool invocation and response content.

methods.name: test_parallel_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple tool calls in a single response for multiple entities.

methods.name: test_multiple_tool_calls
methods.description: Tests multiple different tools invoked in a single query.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_no_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function with no parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_custom_tool_optional_parameters
methods.description: Tests a custom tool function with optional parameters.

methods.name: test_tool_call_list_parameters
methods.description: Tests a tool that handles list parameters, such as multiple URLs.
